tosdr.case: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
quoteText: OUR AGGREGATE LIABILITY RELATING TO, ARISING OUT OF, OR IN ANY WAY IN CONNECTION WITH OUR TERMS, US, OR OUR SERVICES WILL NOT EXCEED THE GREATER OF ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS ($100) OR THE AMOUNT YOU HAVE PAID US IN THE PAST TWELVE MONTHS.
